knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

ENSAB databases

```{r}
library(here)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)

ninos <- read_delim(
  here("ensab", "M3_NINOS.txt"), 
  delim = "|", 
  locale = locale(encoding = "Latin1")
)

examen13 <- read_delim(
  here("ensab", "M4_EXAMEN_1.txt"), 
  delim = "|", 
  locale = locale(encoding = "Latin1")
)

examen5 <- read_delim(
  here("ensab", "M4_EXAMEN_2.txt"), 
  delim = "|", 
  locale = locale(encoding = "Latin1")
)

hogar <- read_delim(
  here("ensab", "M1_HOGAR.txt"), 
  delim = "|", 
  locale = locale(encoding = "Latin1")
)

```

We have a total of 6446 children for the sample size

```{r}
glimpse(ninos)
names(ninos)
```

Keep variables:

- MPIO
- DPTO
- M3_100C: age
- M3_103A: remove
- M3_104:
